700928f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Devoe Avenue
700928f-a.text:
E. Tremont Avenue, at the N. E. corner of Devoe Avenue.
July 23, 1940
P. L. Sperr

700929f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Devoe Avenue
700929f-a.text:
E. Tremont Awenue, north side, from the Bronx River to Devoe Avenue (right), showing the Tremont Used Car Exchange and the
I. R. T. subway elevated structure.
July 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr
